markdown:
| icon           = poe2 cloak_nemnok icon.png
| description    = This dilapidated cloak once belonged to one of Nemnok's unfortunate guests. This particular dwarf was no penitent worshiper. Rather, he claimed to be a great warrior come to slay Nemnok and free his tribe from the monster's reign. He boasted of his magic cape which could stave off injury and death. Then, with a mighty shout, the warrior challenged Nemnok to battle.

After a brief and one-sided bout, Nemnok subdued the would-be usurper and set to work torturing him to death. Remarkably, the cape sustained its reputation and the dwarf stubbornly clung to life for quite some time.
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Cape
| item_type      = Cloak
| item_category  = Accessory
